languages.text: "Эмоциональные причины не требуются, поскольку присутствуют рациональные. Наблюдения указывают, что в ходе данной вокс-трансляции эффективность экипажа командного мостика упала на девять целых две десятых единицы".
"Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."
languages.original_text: "Эмоциональные причины не требуются, поскольку присутствуют рациональные. Наблюдения указывают, что в ходе данной вокс-трансляции эффективность экипажа командного мостика упала на девять целых две десятых единицы".

traits.locale_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary because rational reasons are present. Observations indicate that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two tenths of a unit during the broadcast."

"Emotional reasons are unnecessary because rational reasons are present. Observations indicate that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two tenths of a unit during the broadcast."
"Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."
"Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."
"Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."
"Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

languages.text: « Toute explication émotionnelle est superflue lorsque des éléments rationnels sont en jeu. D'après diverses observations, l'efficacité de l'équipage de la passerelle de commandement a chuté de neuf points et deux unités au cours de la diffusion. »
languages.original_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

traits.locale_text: « Toute explication émotionnelle est superflue lorsqu'il y a des éléments rationnels. D'après diverses observations, l'efficacité de l'équipage de la passerelle de commandement a chuté de neuf points et deux unités au cours de la diffusion. »

languages.text: “对于理性分析而言，情感因素完全没有必要。观察结果显示，在广播期间，舰桥军官的工作效率下降了9.2%。”
languages.original_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

traits.locale_text: “对于理性而言，情感因素完全没有必要。观察结果显示，在广播期间，舰桥军官的工作效率下降了9.2%。”

languages.text: "Emotionale Gründe sind unnötig, wenn rationale Gründe vorhanden sind. Beobachtungen zeigen, dass die Effizienz der Crew auf der Kommandobrücke während der Übertragung um 9,2 Einheiten gesunken ist."
languages.original_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

traits.locale_text: "Emotionale Gründe sind unnötig, wenn rationale vorhanden sind. Beobachtungen zeigen, dass die Effizienz der Crew auf der Kommandobrücke während der Übertragung um 9,2 Einheiten gesunken ist."

languages.text: «Las razones emocionales son innecesarias en presencia de la lógica. Las observaciones indican que la eficiencia de la tripulación del puente de mando descendió en nueve coma dos unidades mientras se reproducía la transmisión».
languages.original_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

traits.locale_text: «Las razones emocionales son innecesarias en presencia de la razón. Las observaciones indican que la eficiencia de la tripulación del puente de mando descendió en nueve punto dos unidades mientras se reproducía la transmisión».

languages.text: 「合理的な理由があれば、感情的な理由は不要です。観察によれば、放送中に指揮ブリッジのクルーの効率が9.2ユニット下がりました」
languages.original_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

traits.locale_text: 「合理的な理由があれば、感情的な理由は不要です。観察によれば、放送中に指揮ブリッジのクルーの効率が9.2ユニット下がりました」

languages.text: "Rasyonel sebepler mevcut iken duygusal sebepler gereksizdir. Gözlemler, bu yayın sırasında komuta köprüsü mürettebatının verimliliğinin dokuz virgül iki birim düştüğünü gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "Emotional reasons are unnecessary when rational reasons are present. Observations show that the efficiency of the command bridge crew dropped by nine point two units during the broadcast."

traits.locale_text: "Rasyonel sebepler mevcut iken duygusal sebepler gereksizdir. Gözlemler, bu yayın sırasında komuta köprüsü mürettebatının verimliliğinin dokuz nokta iki birim düştüğünü gösteriyor."
